And{G1161} why{G5101} beholdest thou{G991} the mote{G3588} that is{G3588} in{G1722} thy{G4675} brother's{G3588} eye{G3588}, but{G1161} considerest{G2657} not{G3756} the beam{G1385} that is in{G1722} thine own{G4674} eye{G3788}?

If{G1487} ye{G5210} then{G3767}, being{G5607} evil{G4190}, know how{G1492} to give{G1325} good{G18} gifts{G1390} unto{G3588} your{G5216} children{G5043}, how much{G4214} more{G3123} shall{G1325} your{G5216} Father{G3588} which is{G3588} in{G1722} heaven{G3588} give{G1325} good things{G18} to them that{G3588} ask{G154} him{G846}?

Ye shall know{G1921} them{G846} by{G575} their{G846} fruits{G3588}. Do{G3385} men gather{G4816} grapes{G4718} of{G575} thorns{G173}, or{G2228} figs{G4810} of{G575} thistles{G5146}?

Not{G3756} every{G3956} one that saith{G3004} unto me{G3427}, Lord{G2962}, Lord{G2962}, shall enter{G1525} into{G1519} the kingdom{G3588} of heaven{G3588}; but{G235} he that doeth{G4160} the will{G3588} of my{G3450} Father{G3588} which is in{G1722} heaven{G3772}.
